articles.title: Structure of the native myosin filament in the relaxed cardiac sarcomere - Nature.com
articles.description: A cryo-electron tomography study reports the structure of thick myosin filaments of mouse cardiac muscle in the relaxed state in situ and the MyBP-C links that connect them with the surrounding thin actin filaments.
